content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah Rahman, thank you for your interest in my apartment in Munich. I am glad to hear that you would like to discuss the rental price. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I was thinking a monthly rent of 800 Euros would be fair. This price takes into account the current market rates and the value of the apartment. What do you think about this rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 800 Euros. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I am glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of 800 Euros. I appreciate your interest in the apartment and look forward to having you as a tenant. If you have any questions or need any additional information, please do not hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have a question. Can I negotiate the rental price?
I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I want to make sure I am getting the best deal possible.
I am not trying to be rude, but I don't want to pay more than I have to.
Can I ask if there is any room for negotiation?
Thank you for your understanding.

Ryanah Rahman.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah Rahman, I understand that you are looking for the best deal possible and I am happy to negotiate with you. However, based on the size and location of the apartment, 800 Euros per month is the best price I can offer. I am willing to consider any reasonable offers you may have, but I am not able to go any lower than this price. Please let me know if you have any specific concerns or if there is anything else I can do to assist you.
name: Heinrich Heine
